    Introduction

Introduction

Source: vignettes/introduction.Rmd
introduction.Rmd

When creating R markdown websites, I often find myself wanting to organise content into a nice-looking grid of links. For example, in a recent project I wanted something like this:

Starting R markdown

An introduction to R markdown. The target audience is a novice R user with no previous experience with markdown.

Starting ggplot2

An introduction to ggplot2. The target audience is a novice user with no previous experience with R or ggplot2.

Starting programming

This is primarily a tutorial on making generative art in R, but in doing so introduces core programming constructs and data structures. It is assumed the user has some previous experience with ggplot2.

The goal of bs4cards is to his task a little easier inside an R markdown document or website.

Enabling bootstrap 4

The bs4cards package takes its name from the “cards” system introduced in bootstrap version 4, and the package does not work for R markdown documents that rely on bootstrap version 3. To ensure that you are using bootstrap 4, you need to edit the YAML header for your document to specify which version of bootstrap you want to use. For example, here is the relevant section of YAML you might use in a simple R markdown site

output:
  html_document:
    theme:
      version: 4

This overrides the R markdown defaults to ensure that the output is built using boostrap 4.5 rather than an older version (boostrap 3.4) that doesn’t support cards.

To enable bootstrap 4 in a pkgdown site (such as this one), edit the _pkgdown.yml file to include the following

template:
  bootstrap: 4

(You may need to update to the development version of pkgdown to make this work!)

Basic cards

library(bs4cards)
card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute."
)
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image below is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.",
  image_align = "bottom"
)
My First Card

The image below is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

Card grids

kitty <- function( ...) {
  card(
    title = "A kitten card",
    image = sample_kitten(),
    text = sample_lorem(),
    ...
  )
}

kitty_list <- list(kitty(), kitty(), kitty(), 
                   kitty(), kitty(), kitty())

card_group(kitty_list)
A kitten card

An me, inquam, nisi te audire vellem, censes haec dicturum fuisse? Dempta enim aeternitate nihilo beatior Iuppiter quam Epicurus; Itaque hic ipse iam pridem est reiectus;

A kitten card

Facile pateremur, qui etiam nunc agendi aliquid discendique causa prope contra naturam vígillas suscipere soleamus. Sed quanta sit alias, nunc tantum possitne esse tanta. His enim rebus detractis negat se reperire in asotorum vita quod reprehendat.

A kitten card

Nosti, credo, illud: Nemo pius est, qui pietatem-; Et certamen honestum et disputatio splendida! Si quicquam extra virtutem habeatur in bonis.

A kitten card

Nosti, credo, illud: Nemo pius est, qui pietatem-; Eam si varietatem diceres, intellegerem, ut etiam non dicente te intellego; Quid igitur dubitamus in tota eius natura quaerere quid sit effectum?

A kitten card

Ita ne hoc quidem modo paria peccata sunt. Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Ergo ita: non posse honeste vivi, nisi honeste vivatur?

A kitten card

Honesta oratio, Socratica, Platonis etiam. Nec vero hoc oratione solum, sed multo magis vita et factis et moribus comprobavit. Cur ipse Pythagoras et Aegyptum lustravit et Persarum magos adiit?

Headers and footers

list(kitty(footer = "Kitten A"), 
     kitty(footer = "Kitten B"), 
     kitty(footer = "Kitten C")) %>% 
  card_group()
A kitten card

Eodem modo is enim tibi nemo dabit, quod, expetendum sit, id esse laudabile. Satis est tibi in te, satis in legibus, satis in mediocribus amicitiis praesidii. Qui ita affectus, beatum esse numquam probabis;

Kitten A
A kitten card

Omnia contraria, quos etiam insanos esse vultis. Eaedem res maneant alio modo. Quasi vero, inquit, perpetua oratio rhetorum solum, non etiam philosophorum sit.

Kitten B
A kitten card

Haec para/doca illi, nos admirabilia dicamus. Ita ne hoc quidem modo paria peccata sunt. Eodem modo is enim tibi nemo dabit, quod, expetendum sit, id esse laudabile.

Kitten C
list(kitty(header = "Kitten A"), 
     kitty(header = "Kitten B"), 
     kitty(header = "Kitten C")) %>% 
  card_group()
Kitten A
A kitten card

Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Facile pateremur, qui etiam nunc agendi aliquid discendique causa prope contra naturam vígillas suscipere soleamus. Ita ne hoc quidem modo paria peccata sunt.

Kitten B
A kitten card

Tria genera bonorum; At quicum ioca seria, ut dicitur, quicum arcana, quicum occulta omnia? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Honesta oratio, Socratica, Platonis etiam.

Kitten C
A kitten card

Nosti, credo, illud: Nemo pius est, qui pietatem-; Contemnit enim disserendi elegantiam, confuse loquitur. Quae fere omnia appellantur uno ingenii nomine, easque virtutes qui habent, ingeniosi vocantur.

Customising card width

card(
  title = "My First Card",
  image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200",
  text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.",
  width = bs_col(medium = 4) 
)
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card( title = "My First Card", image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200", text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.", width = bs_col(medium = 6) )
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.

card( title = "My First Card", image = "https://placekitten.com/300/200", text = "The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.", width = bs_col(large = 6) )
My First Card

The image above is from placekitten.com. It is extremely cute.
